summary: After Miss Jane Marple is made a trustee of a merchant marine training vessel, a fellow trustee is poisoned, and ship's officers are later murdered after she comes on board.

keywords: 1960s|female protagonist|reference to neptune the roman deity|miss marple|ship
title: Asesinato a bordo
